_header: A thief of his trueness to witness drew

CamTCC323.Transcription:
A þief of is treunesse to widnesse droucrist & seinte marie
                    þat dude muche wouOn fries children beid heo strupte for soitAc
                    euesone a morewen wel lutel þer heo loit
CamTCC323.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Catalogue of the
                    Western Manuscripts in the Library of Trinity College, Cambridge.
         4 vols. Cambridge: at the UP, 1900-1904: 1.441.
